casebody.data: In the Matter of DISCIPLINE OF L. Morris GLUCKSMAN. No. D-2918. Supreme Court of the United States Aug. 8, 2016. L. Morris Glucksman, of Stamford, Connecticut, is suspended from the practice of law in this Court and a rule will issue, returnable within 40 days, requiring him to show cause why he should not be disbarred from the practice of law in this Court.
